title: An Evil Game, A Love Game
resume: Game Rai Game Rak is a Thai television drama. Saichon is an islander living on Min island. One day, destiny leads him to find Fahlada, a 17 years old girl lying unconscious on the beach. When she wakes up, he realizes that she lost all her memories.
